summary: This will eliminate the Glowing Eye Bug
descriptionHtml:
Hello

I released this mod some time ago as my DraugsNoGlowingEyes mod. Now I rerelease it in the BugFix Section (thanks to jroyes for this idea) because it\'s also a workaround for the glowing eye bug.

It will eliminate the meshinfo, which is responsible for the glowing eyes.

Be aware that this will also remove the glowing eye effect from the draugrs and skeletons.

Since I don\'t have a save file with that bug I can\'t detect which mesh (draugr or skeleton) is the
\"bad\" one so i let the files as they are.

Attention: this will overwrite draugr meshes (perhaps from another mod) located in

DATA\\MESHES\\ACTORS\\DRAUGR\\CHARACTER ASSETS\\; so make a backup

To install:

extract .7z archive in your data folder located in your Skyrim main folder 
or use NexusModManager

The mod should work with every draugr retexture

Use at your own risk.
author: Wast1980
